decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments to change the description of the development are deemed to be accepted:

"Erection of 2/3 storey care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking, servicing, refuse and recycling"
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission P0755.21 dated 27th May 2022 to amend the description of development to remove reference to number of units to  "Erection of 2/3 storey care home for the frail elderly (Class C2 Use) with ancillary and communal accommodation, together with associated landscaping, access arrangements, car and cycle parking".
site_name: Havering College Of Further And Higher Education
